pages.description: You find what remains of the food supplies that were on board the helicopter, scattered around the crash site.
You manage to pick up a few of the food supplies that survived the crash. It's not much, but it will have to do for the time being.

NOTE:
Food is consumed after a certain number of moves. Run out of food, and you starve and start taking damage.

Find more food by exploring and looking for anything that stands out.
